Description: OoK Jr will keep the knockback of a stage spike, but be able to act Immediately. (Frame 1 tech from the video does not work anymore)
Requirements / setup: Be out of the Clown Kart. Get hit into the stage so that it causes a tech situation, don't Hold up or away from wall and press Shield/Grab during the wall cling/bounce animation.
Link: `Bowser Jr wall jump teching and frame 1 tech <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7Zu74mbF9OU>`_

Description: After Jr uses his Up-B, you can wall jump tech while getting stage spiked.
Requirements / setup: Be out of the Clown Kart, Get hit into the stage so that it causes a tech situation, Hold up or away from wall and press Shield/Grab during the wall cling/bounce animation, or within 8 frames prior to touching the wall.

Description: You can bring kart back instead of teching to not bounce off the floor, or be put into a tech read situation. this has less lag than teching in place.
Requirements / setup: n / a

Description: After firing a cannonball, grabbing the ledge will cancel it's end-lag.
Requirements / setup: Be within ledge grabbing range after firing a cannonball

Description: You can space the landing hit to be where the opponent stands to almost break a full shield.
Requirements / setup: space it.

Description: after about 10 frames of aerial kart dash, you can spinout, and cancel it within 3 frames with jump, to get a small distance boost.
Requirements / setup: spin and jump within 3 frames.

Description: Kart dash can slide or not slide depending on certain circumstances.
Requirements / setup: Spin out at various points before hitting the ground.

Description: Kart dash after landing (after the bounce) raises the armor of kart dash.
Requirements / setup: kart dash after a short hop or jump, bounce off the floor, and continue driving.

Koopaling tech: Shield Freeze Kart Jump Canceled Abandon Ship.
Description: While you are in the freeze frames of kart dashing an opponent's shield, you can get 1 frame of kart jump, and then replace it with the first frame of a special move. If Up special is used you will rise with the momentum of the kart jump, once shield freeze has ended.
Requirements / setup: Hit shield with kart dash.

Description: Mecha Koopa can launch in various directions depending on certain circumstances.
Requirements / setup: Hit the opponent slight before or after mecha grabs on for various results.

Description: Hit the opponent's shield twice with the hilt of the hammer swing.
Requirements / setup: Swing while falling or rising in the center of the opponent's shield.

Description: After Jr uses his Up-B and is hit, you can tech in a way that keeps the Knockback from the original hit, and you can immediately act with kart. This fails at a high enough knockback before untechable, however.
Requirements / setup: Be out of the Clown Kart, Get hit into the stage so that it causes a tech situation, do not Hold up or away and press Shield/Grab within 8 frames prior to touching the wall. Failure will perform the broken wall tech.

Description: If a mecha is thrown and caught, breaking the mech while its held will cause the mech to continue it's trejectory from when it was caught.
Requirements / setup: Catch a thrown mecha, and have an opponent hit the mecha with enough damage to break it.

Description: If mecha is z grabbed on the frame it explodes (from being hit, unsure on natural explosion), you will recreate a mechakoopa with the same timer. this mecha is special in that the explosion will hurt anyone, even the user.
Requirements / setup: After an opponent hits a mecha you were holding, jump and z grab it with frame perfect timing

Description: While swinging the hammer or scepter, koopalings automatically pickup items.
Requirements / setup: Swing your hammer when close enough to an item

Description: MK can be bounced on the floor or wall with a down or side throw respectively, when very close to the floor or wall.
Requirements / setup: Mecha Koopa must be picked up before it begins walking. This could be after throwing it from the air, or from a platform to a lower ground.

Description: BMK can be bounced on the floor with a down throw.
Requirements / setup: Own a Bounce-able Mecha Koopa. Be on the floor when throwing it.

Description: BMK can be bounced on the wall with a side throw
Requirements / setup: Own a Bounce-able Mecha Koopa. Be very close to the wall when throwing it.

Description: MK will Keep wind or water force when held, and will add the force to next throw or Z-Drop
Requirements / setup: Hold a MK, and have it get hit by wind or water. If Jr gets hit by wind/water, The mecha does not necessarily capture the effect. Some moves require Jr to face away from the move, so the item is between Jr and the water/wind.

Description: after hitting shield, Bowser Jr. will cancel kart dash with jump, and then footstool the opponent's shield.
Requirements / setup: After going through Kart dash shield hitlag, wait a moment, then jump twice quickly to footstool.
